channel.title: Delete
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]EDIT:[/b][/size] I fixed it. Please delete this topic
I'm using the client provided by Exion and I can't figure out two things. I've searched the cache and I can't figure out how to get rid of the flames. When I change the title.jag to change the background, it works but the image is split in half and in reverse. qq
[b]EDIT:[/b] I figured out how to remove the flames. Still don't know how to get rid of the reverse thingy. qq Here's a picture (don't mind the quality): [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/15x97b5.gif[/img]
